sentence: White House removes Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from advisory panel after Senate runs March 24, 202200:17 In his book, Shaw writes that malignant narcissists, a term used for people who are supremely self-involved, without empathy, controlling and often abusive, do not suffer from such moral, ethical or personal conflicts.
title: Herschel Walker lied about things that could easily be found out. Why do people do that?
